title: merkle Prospect Details(Retail)
description: Prospect Profile extensions by merkle. This is for the retail industry

xdm:quintile.title: Arts & Crafts Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the arts and crafts category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Arts & Crafts Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Arts & Crafts category

xdm:trainingAndPublicationsQuintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the B2B Training and Publications category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Beauty and Spa category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Books category

xdm:catalog.title: Channel Preference Ratio - Catalog
xdm:catalog.description: Provides a measure of the preferred purchase channel of the household. Ratio of the transactions within a specific channel compared to overall transactions bucketed into 5 quintile groupings.

xdm:online.title: Channel Preference Ratio - Online
xdm:online.description: Provides a measure of the preferred purchase channel of the household. Ratio of the transactions within a specific channel compared to overall transactions bucketed into 5 quintile groupings.

xdm:retail.title: Channel Preference Ratio - Retail
xdm:retail.description: Provides a measure of the preferred purchase channel of the household. Ratio of the transactions within a specific channel compared to overall transactions bucketed into 5 quintile groupings.

xdm:quintile.title: Children's Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Childrens category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Children's Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Childrens category

xdm:numberOfDollarsOnReturns.title: Number of Dollars on Returns
xdm:numberOfDollarsOnReturns.description: Total dollars associated with product returns across all persons in the household within the last 24 months

xdm:numberOfOne-ShotOrders.title: Number of One-Shot Orders
xdm:numberOfOne-ShotOrders.description: Number of one-shot product orders across all persons in the household within the last 24 months

xdm:numberOfReturns.title: Number of Returns
xdm:numberOfReturns.description: Number of returns made across all persons in the household within the last 24 months

xdm:numberOfReturnsInTheLastYear.title: Number of Returns in the Last Year
xdm:numberOfReturnsInTheLastYear.description: Number of returns made in the last year across all persons in the household within the last 24 months

xdm:quintile.title: Collectibles Quintile

xdm:donationRecency.description: Recency of donation in the Environmental and Animal category

xdm:environmentalAndAnimalDonorQuintile.description: Average dollar donations that were spent on the Environmental and Animal category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the High Ticket Female Apparel/Accessories category

xdm:accQuintile.title: High Ticket Female Apparel/Acc. Quintile
xdm:accQuintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the High Ticket Female Apparel/Accessories category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings 12 month average spend is $150+.

xdm:quintile.title: High Ticket Home Decor Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the High Ticket Home Décor category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings. 12 month average spend is $175+

xdm:recency.title: High Ticket Home Decor Recency
xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the High Ticket Home Décor category

xdm:internet.title: Household Purchase Channel - Internet
xdm:internet.description: Indicates that at least one individual within the household has made a purchase via the Internet within the last 24 months

xdm:mailOrder.title: Household Purchase Channel - Mail Order
xdm:mailOrder.description: Indicates that at least one individual within the household has made a purchase via the mail order within the last 24 months

xdm:sweepstakes.title: Household Purchase Channel - Sweepstakes

xdm:telemarket.title: Household Purchase Channel - Telemarket

xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Fashion Accessories and Beauty category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Male Apparel category

xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the Mid Ticket Female Apparel/Accessories category

xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Modern/Contemporary Décor and Gifts category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the Modern/Contemporary Décor and Gifts category

xdm:amazonPrimeCustomers.title: MT - Amazon Prime Customers
xdm:amazonPrimeCustomers.description: Amazon Prime members who have shopped on Amazon 4+ times in the last 12 months

xdm:bargainShoppers.title: MT - Bargain Shoppers
xdm:bargainShoppers.description: merkle's Bargain Shoppers model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to shop on sale or use coupons.

xdm:brandLoyalists.title: MT - Brand Loyalists
xdm:brandLoyalists.description: Develop shopping list that includes specific brand preferences (Chobani vs. yogurt) and focus on brands vs. price

xdm:convenienceCook.title: MT - Convenience Cook
xdm:convenienceCook.description: Cooks focused on deliver easier to prepare and faster meals

xdm:everydayLowPriceShoppers.title: MT - Everyday Low Price Shoppers
xdm:everydayLowPriceShoppers.description: Greater likelihood to shop at or favor everyday low price format (example: Walmart)

xdm:experimentalCooks.title: MT - Experimental Cooks
xdm:experimentalCooks.description: Cooks that like to explore new recipes and meal ideas

xdm:groceryStoreAppUsers.title: MT - Grocery Store App Users
xdm:groceryStoreAppUsers.description: merkle's Grocery Store App Users model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to use grocery apps when they shop. Model employs TSP data.

xdm:groceryStoreFrequenters.title: MT - Grocery Store Frequenters
xdm:groceryStoreFrequenters.description: merkle's Grocery Store Frequenters model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to shop frequently at grocery stores. Model employs TSP data.

xdm:heavyCouponUsers.title: MT - Heavy Coupon Users
xdm:heavyCouponUsers.description: Increased likelihood to be active coupon clippers and redeemers

xdm:high-EndShoppers.title: MT - High-end Shoppers
xdm:high-EndShoppers.description: merkle's High-end Shopper model  ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to shop in high-end stores (specialty or department) such as Coach or Nordstorms.

xdm:impulsePurchasers.title: MT - Impulse Purchasers
xdm:impulsePurchasers.description: Increased likelihood shoppers will purchase off list items during in-store shopping

xdm:incentiveSeekers.title: MT - Incentive Seekers
xdm:incentiveSeekers.description: Shoppers actively seeking price incentives (e.g. coupons) or researching what is on sale

xdm:masterCook.title: MT - Master Cook
xdm:masterCook.description: Skilled cooks that enjoy the experience of cooking

xdm:mealPlanners.title: MT - Meal Planners
xdm:mealPlanners.description: Shoppers who develop weekly meal plans and shopping list to match their meal plans

xdm:mensBigAndTallApparelCustomers.title: MT - Mens Big and Tall Apparel Customers
xdm:mensBigAndTallApparelCustomers.description: merkle's Men's Big and Tall model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood be Men's Big and Tall households

xdm:mobileShoppingListUsers.title: MT - Mobile Shopping List Users
xdm:mobileShoppingListUsers.description: Greater likelihood to make a shopping list on their mobile phone

xdm:multi-RetailerShoppers.title: MT - Multi-Retailer Shoppers
xdm:multi-RetailerShoppers.description: Increased likelihood of going to multiple retailers to execute their shopping list and  fulfil shopping trip needs

xdm:one-StopShoppers.title: MT - One-Stop Shoppers
xdm:one-StopShoppers.description: Primarily shop at one retailer for each shopping trip

xdm:onlineHomeDeliveryCustomers.title: MT - Online - Home Delivery Customers
xdm:onlineHomeDeliveryCustomers.description: Shopped for groceries online and had them delivered to their home in the last 12 months

xdm:onlinePickUpCustomers.title: MT - Online - Pick Up Customers
xdm:onlinePickUpCustomers.description: Shopped for groceries online and picked them up at the store in the last 12 months

xdm:onlinePetFoodBuyers.title: MT - Online Pet Food Buyers
xdm:onlinePetFoodBuyers.description: Increased likelihood to purchase or interested in purchasing pet food online

xdm:pandemicDecreasedSpenders.title: MT - Pandemic - Decreased Spenders
xdm:pandemicDecreasedSpenders.description: merkle's Pandemic - Decreased Spenders model which ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to have decreased spending during the pandemic.  Model employs TSP data.

xdm:pandemicLuxurySpenders.title: MT - Pandemic - Luxury Spenders
xdm:pandemicLuxurySpenders.description: merkle's Pandemic - Luxury Spenders model which ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be luxury spenders during the pandemic.  Model employs TSP data.

xdm:pandemicRiskTolerantConsumers.title: MT - Pandemic - Risk Tolerant Consumers
xdm:pandemicRiskTolerantConsumers.description: merkle's Pandemic - Risk Tolerant Consumers model which ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be risk tolerant during the pandemic.  Model employs TSP data.

xdm:paperShoppingListUsers.title: MT - Paper Shopping List Users
xdm:paperShoppingListUsers.description: Shoppers who make and use paper list

xdm:petOwners.title: MT - Pet Owners
xdm:petOwners.description: merkle's Pet Owner model which ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to  own a pet.  Model employs TSP data

xdm:petsAreFamily.title: MT - Pets Are Family
xdm:petsAreFamily.description: Greater likelihood pet is treated as family member (in photos, birthday celebrations, goes to spa)

xdm:planToGetFitnessMembership.title: MT - Plan to get Fitness Membership
xdm:planToGetFitnessMembership.description: merkle's Fitness Membership model  ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to plan to get a membership in the  next 12 months.

xdm:pre-ShopPlanners.title: MT - Pre-Shop Planners
xdm:pre-ShopPlanners.description: Greater likelihood shoppers are spending time research and planning trips prior to going to the store

xdm:priceMatchers.title: MT - Price Matchers
xdm:priceMatchers.description: Shoppers that tend to match prices across retailers to where to shop and what to buy

xdm:quickShopAtWalmartOrTarget.title: MT - Quick Shop at Walmart or Target
xdm:quickShopAtWalmartOrTarget.description: Shoppers that complete quick stop in trips at Walmart or Target

xdm:realIngredientCook.title: MT - Real Ingredient Cook
xdm:realIngredientCook.description: Cook ingredients that take additional preparation work (buy lettuce vs. bagged salad)

xdm:retailTexters.title: MT - Retail Texters
xdm:retailTexters.description: merkle's Retail Texter model  ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to open text messages from retailers.

xdm:retailerCircularReaders.title: MT - Retailer Circular Readers
xdm:retailerCircularReaders.description: Shoppers who have an increased likelihood to research trips by reviewing newspaper or digital circulars

xdm:retailerEmailSubscribers.title: MT - Retailer Email Subscribers
xdm:retailerEmailSubscribers.description: Greater likelihood to subscribe to retailer emails

xdm:stock-UpAtWalmart.title: MT - Stock-Up at Walmart
xdm:stock-UpAtWalmart.description: Shopper that complete larger dollar sales trips at Walmart stores

xdm:stock-UpShoppers.title: MT - Stock-Up Shoppers
xdm:stock-UpShoppers.description: Increase likelihood to complete larger shopping trips to fill-up on items and stock their pantries

xdm:subscrOrAutoShipClothAndAcc.title: MT - Subscr or Auto Ship - Cloth & Acc
xdm:subscrOrAutoShipClothAndAcc.description: merkle's Subscription or Auto Shipment-Clothing and Accessories model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be subscribers.

xdm:subscrOrAutoShipFoodOrBev.title: MT - Subscr or Auto Ship - Food or Bev
xdm:subscrOrAutoShipFoodOrBev.description: merkle's Subscription or Auto Shipment-Food or Beverage model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be subscribers.

xdm:subscrOrAutoShipHholdProduct.title: MT - Subscr or Auto Ship - Hhold Product
xdm:subscrOrAutoShipHholdProduct.description: merkle's Subscription or Auto Shipment-Household Product model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be subscribers.

xdm:subscrOrAutoShipPersonalCare.title: MT - Subscr or Auto Ship - Personal Care
xdm:subscrOrAutoShipPersonalCare.description: merkle's Subscription or Auto Shipment-Personal Care model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be subscribers.

xdm:subscrOrAutoShipPetProducts.title: MT - Subscr or Auto Ship - Pet Products
xdm:subscrOrAutoShipPetProducts.description: merkle's Subscription or Auto Shipment-Pet Products model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to be subscribers.

xdm:targetCartwheelUsers.title: MT - Target Cartwheel Users
xdm:targetCartwheelUsers.description: Shoppers that report using the Target Cartwheel App

xdm:targetEnthusiast.title: MT - Target Enthusiast
xdm:targetEnthusiast.description: Greater likelihood shoppers are loyal and supporters of target

xdm:veterinarianInfluencedPetOwners.title: MT - Veterinarian Influenced Pet Owners
xdm:veterinarianInfluencedPetOwners.description: Pet food owner is more likely to follow veterinarian recommendations for pet food

xdm:walmartEnthusiast.title: MT - Walmart Enthusiast
xdm:walmartEnthusiast.description: Greater likelihood shoppers are loyal and supporters of Walmart

xdm:walmartSavingCatcherUsers.title: MT - Walmart Saving Catcher Users
xdm:walmartSavingCatcherUsers.description: Shoppers that report using the Walmart Savings Catcher App

xdm:webAndInstoreViewerOnlineBuyer.title: MT - Web and Instore Viewer/Online Buyer
xdm:webAndInstoreViewerOnlineBuyer.description: merkle's Web and Brick & Mortar Viewer/Online Purchaser model  ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to first surf the web and look at products in stores and then make purchases in online.

xdm:webSurferInstoreBuyer.title: MT - Web Surfer/Instore Buyer
xdm:webSurferInstoreBuyer.description: merkle's Web Surfer/Brick & Mortar Purchaser model  ranks consumers based upon their likelihood to first surf the web then make purchases in stores.

xdm:what'SOnSaleShoppers.title: MT - What's On Sale Shoppers
xdm:what'SOnSaleShoppers.description: Greater likelihood shoppers plan what to buy based on what is on sale and will not purchase products unless on-sale

xdm:womensPlusSizeApparelCustomers.title: MT - Womens Plus Size Apparel Customers
xdm:womensPlusSizeApparelCustomers.description: merkle's Women's Plus Size model ranks consumers based upon their likelihood be women's plus size households

xdm:cash.title: Payment Method - Cash
xdm:cash.description: Indicates that an individual in the household has made a purchase using a credit card or cash card

xdm:creditCard.title: Payment Method - Credit Card
xdm:creditCard.description: Indicates that an individual in the household has made a purchase using a credit card or cash card

xdm:quintile.title: Publishing Kitchen & Home Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Publishing Kitchen and Home category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recency.title: Publishing Kitchen & Home Recency
xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the Publishing Kitchen and Home category

xdm:purchaseDateRange.title: Purchase Date Range
xdm:purchaseDateRange.description: Number of months last purchase was made

xdm:fallRatioQuintile.title: Seasonality - Fall Ratio Quintile
xdm:fallRatioQuintile.description: The proportion of all purchases occurring during the time period of September 1-November 30 divided by the total # of purchases over all months bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:springRatioQuintile.title: Seasonality - Spring Ratio Quintile
xdm:springRatioQuintile.description: The proportion of all purchases occurring during the time period of March 1-May 30 divided by the total # of purchases over all months bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:summerRatioQuintile.title: Seasonality - Summer Ratio Quintile
xdm:summerRatioQuintile.description: The proportion of all purchases occurring during the time period of June 1-August 31 divided by the total # of purchases over all months bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:winterRatioQuintile.title: Seasonality - Winter Ratio Quintile
xdm:winterRatioQuintile.description: The proportion of all purchases occurring during the time period of December 1-February 28(29) divided by the total # of purchases over all months bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:quintile.title: Senior Products Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Senior Products category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Senior Products Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Senior Products category

xdm:quintile.title: Shoes Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Shoes category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Shoes Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Shoes category

xdm:quintile.title: Specialty Foods and Gifts Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Special Foods and Gifts category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recency.title: Specialty Foods and Gifts Recency
xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the Special Foods and Gifts category

xdm:quintile.title: Sports and Outdoor Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the sports and outdoor category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Sports and Outdoor Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Sports and Outdoor Category

xdm:quintile.title: Sports Merchandise & Activewear Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Sports Merchandise and Activewear bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recency.title: Sports Merchandise & Activewear Recency
xdm:recency.description: Recency of purchase in the Sports Merchandise and Activewear category

xdm:quintile.title: Tools & Electronics Quintile
xdm:quintile.description: Average dollars that were spent on the Tools & Electronics category bucketed into 5 quintile groupings

xdm:recencyOfPurchase.title: Tools & Electronics Recency of Purchase
xdm:recencyOfPurchase.description: Recency of purchase in the Tools & Electronics category
